name: Where Is My Stuff?
description:
3:rd place in Global Game Jam Gothenburg 2021.

Travel through a colorful dreamworld and help the small cat collect as many toys as possible before it wakes up. Fly across the different rooms in your hovering cardboard box and try to beat your highscore as the rooms get progressively more challenging - but no less cute! About the Game

"Where Is My Stuff?" is a happy game with a dreamy theme where you try to retake your lost toys. Use your mighty baguette to hit the rats and collect as many balls of yarn, fish plushies and mouse plushies as possible to raise your highscore. The game takes place inside of a dream with many different colorful backgrounds and pieces of furniture.

Features

- A cute and colorful theme to brighten your day

- Increasing difficulty for a fun and challenging time

- Varying backgrounds and assets 

Credits
